TextEquiv.Unicode: A figura apresenta o programa parcial do controlador lógico programável em linguagem SCF (Sequential Flow Chart). Nesse caso, os valores da receptividade da transição com os números 1, 2 e 3 indicados na figura, respectivamente, são A BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1,BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RA ⋅ GF = 1 e BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DR ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1 B BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RA ⋅ GF = 1,BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DR ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1 e BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1 C BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DR ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1,BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1 e BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RA ⋅ GF = 1 D BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1,BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DR ⋅ FR ⋅ RR GF = 1 e BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RA ⋅ GF = 1 E BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DR ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1,BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DA ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1 e BI ⋅ SP ⋅ DR ⋅ FR ⋅ RR ⋅ GF = 1
